import React,{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useCssLoaded}from'../hooks/useCssLoaded';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext(undefined);export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[authLoading,setAuthLoading]=useState(true);const cssLoaded=useCssLoaded();const loading=authLoading||!cssLoaded;useEffect(()=>{// Check if user is logged in on app start
